thread.title: Cyclist loses R100k bicycle in school hostel fire
thread.title_full: Cyclist loses R100k bicycle in school hostel fire | News24

author: news24.com
title: Cyclist loses R100k bicycle in school hostel fire
text:
Potchefstroom - A North West professional cyclist has lost a R100 000 bicycle in a fire that broke out at HoÃ«r Volkskool Potchefstroom on Monday night.
North West Education MEC Wendy Matsemela said the fire broke out at 21:00 on Monday.
"There were three boys in the hostel when the fire broke out; the other 40 were in the study room. The three boys were taken to a place of safety with the other 40. There were no casualties. One pupil who is a professional cyclist lost his R100 000 bicyle in the fire," she said on Tuesday.
The cause of the fire is not known, she said.
